article: sen. barack obama said on friday that he had made repeated lapses of judgment in dealing with an indicted chicago real estate developer , antoin rezko , and acknowledged that rezko had raised more money for his political campaigns than he had previously disclosed .
abstract: obama admits he erred in deal with developer
